text:
Hi all, not sure if this is answered before but i have the standard text and image modules from HS in a drag and drop email, they are centered aligned but on mobi they become left align.

I have 2 exact same h2 tags with the same attr and the one is left aligned and the other stays centered. Only happens on mobi.

See image below. `hi there` should be centred - the heading below is the same but is actually working and not left aligned.

<https://gmailios.capture.litmuscdn.com/bf279907-1585-4aa9-9aa5-c91d07a0505c/results/gmailios-vertical-allowed-1366.png>
